replacements.old: show an overview of specific functions
replacements.new: Displays an overview of specific Proxmox Virtual Environment (PVE) related functions in the script, showing their usage, shortname, and description

replacements.old: show an overview of specific variables
replacements.new: Displays an overview of PVE-specific variables defined in the configuration file, showing their names, values, and usage across different files

replacements.old: vm start or vm-get then shutdown other node
replacements.new: Starts a VM on the current node or migrates it from another node, with an option to shut down the source node after migration

replacements.old: remote vm-pth, migration, local vm-pth
replacements.new: Migrates a VM from a remote node to the current node, handling PCIe passthrough disable/enable during the process

replacements.old: toggle Passthrough lines ON or OFF
replacements.new: Toggles PCIe passthrough configuration for a specified VM, modifying its configuration file to enable or disable passthrough devices

replacements.old: check where VM exists
replacements.new: Checks and reports which node in the Proxmox cluster is currently hosting a specified VM

replacements.old: Prompts user to rename a network interface by editing udev rules and updating network configuration.
replacements.new: Guides the user through renaming a network interface by updating udev rules and network configuration, with an option to reboot the system

replacements.old: Displays the contents of .notes files in a specified or current directory.
replacements.new: Displays the contents of all .notes files found in a specified directory or the current directory, useful for viewing backup notes

replacements.old: Disables specified repository files by commenting out 'deb' lines.
replacements.new: Disables specified Proxmox repository files by commenting out 'deb' lines, typically used to manage repository sources

replacements.old: Adds a specific Proxmox repository line to /etc/apt/sources.list if not already present.
replacements.new: Adds a specific Proxmox VE no-subscription repository line to /etc/apt/sources.list if not already present

replacements.old: Updates and upgrades system packages.
replacements.new: Updates package lists and upgrades all installed packages on the Proxmox system

replacements.old: Removes the Proxmox subscription notice and optionally restarts the pveproxy service.
replacements.new: Removes the Proxmox subscription notice by modifying the web interface JavaScript file, with an option to restart the pveproxy service

replacements.old: Configures initial settings for GPU passthrough and reboots the system.
replacements.new: Configures initial GRUB and EFI settings for GPU passthrough, installs necessary packages, and reboots the system

replacements.old: Adds necessary modules for GPU passthrough and reboots the system.
replacements.new: Adds necessary kernel modules for GPU passthrough to /etc/modules, updates initramfs, and reboots the system

replacements.old: Completes GPU passthrough setup by configuring vfio-pci IDs, blacklisting GPU drivers, and rebooting the system.
replacements.new: Finalizes GPU passthrough setup by configuring VFIO-PCI IDs, blacklisting specific GPU drivers, and rebooting the system

replacements.old: Sets up a Btrfs RAID 1 filesystem on two devices and optionally adds the mount point to /etc/fstab.
replacements.new: Creates a Btrfs RAID 1 filesystem on two specified devices, mounts it, and optionally adds an entry to /etc/fstab

replacements.old: Creates and mounts a ZFS dataset at a specified mount point.
replacements.new: Creates a new ZFS dataset or uses an existing one, sets its mountpoint, and ensures it's mounted at the specified path

replacements.old: Updates the Proxmox container list.
replacements.new: Updates the Proxmox VE Appliance Manager (pveam) container template list

replacements.old: Downloads a specified container template from a storage location.
replacements.new: Downloads a specified container template to a given storage location, with error handling and options to list available templates

replacements.old: updates the occurences of the containertemplate in the config file
replacements.new: Updates the container template reference in the Proxmox configuration file, prompting for user confirmation and new template name

replacements.old: Configures a bind mount for a Proxmox container.
replacements.new: Configures a bind mount for a specified Proxmox container, linking a host directory to a container directory

replacements.old: create a custom container
replacements.new: Creates a custom Proxmox container with specified parameters including network settings, resources, and SSH key

replacements.old: start, stop, enable, or disable a range of containers
replacements.new: Manages multiple Proxmox containers by starting, stopping, enabling, or disabling them, supporting individual IDs, ranges, or all containers
